title: Australian internet in one picture
body: This is basically what it is like to live in certain parts of Australia.

replies.body: Both of you should be banned for AFK. No joke. If you know you're in a dodgy location, check your ping before you queue up. I hope you both got 9 reports.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ocvLufww,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-16T07:25:03.214+0000)
>
> Both of you should be banned for AFK. No joke. If you know you're in a dodgy location, check your ping before you queue up. I hope you both got 9 reports.

I have stable net and  frequently lag spike. It's Riot's servers.

You'd know if it was Riot's problem.

Switch from WIFI to Ethernet.
Pay for a better connection,
Buy a new modem. [My Recomendation](http://www.tp-link.com.au/products/details/Archer-C7.html)
When it's Riot's servers they put loss prevention on. Usually it's an ISP issue that causes those connection issues.
